title: Please help
body: I live in Kansas, and from what I read from other post I see that you are trying to fix it. I just wish to know when you think you would be able to fix this for I tried everything and even the things said on your site, and I only wish to play before school start, and before the first order project skin end because I bought a $50 rp for the bundle. please fix  ; - ;

replies.body: What is the issue that you're experiencing exactly?  For example, what are you observing, where is it happening, and are there error messages?  When you say you've tried things can you explain what that is?

I tried the things given on this site https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944, and my problem is showing how I am unable to connect to the pvp net server. I heard that something with central link internet company is having problem connecting to league service.

1. I tried dns

2. I tried repair

3. I tried uninstalling it

4. Used wired connection instead of wireless

5. Check the IE settings

6. Change the clock

7. And waited for league to fix it

The problem started the day when the project skins came out and I was on the verge of buying the project bundle

Thanks for the follow-up!  Your specific issue is something we're looking into at the moment and our noc technicians are collecting information on the issue in this [thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/B2VFcQKX-stuck-at-logging-in-after-maintenance?comment=000e).  Something that might help them is running a [traceroute](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) to get more details:

(tracert prod.na2.lol.riotgames.com) > "%USERPROFILE%\desktop\Tracert.txt"

You're welcome to post the log here or in the original thread to have the information forwarded.  No eta at the moment, but hang tight!

Thank you so much, I am happy to see feed back on the situation and I shall try to do whatever I can to help, I would hate to miss out of the first order for the project skin, and I shall send a feed back once done.
